app.title: GPT Chatbot AI - Genie
app.description:
Genie is a revolutionary AI chatbot assistant built on GPT-4o, Gemini, Grok, Deepseek, Claude and Qwen for you to access all the assistance you need from a single app.

Genie AI is not just any chatbot app; it's a super helpful tool, crafted with advanced AI technology built on GPT-4o, Gemini, Grok, Deepseek, Claude and Qwen. Imagine having a clever friend right in your phone, always ready to chat, assist, and simplify your daily routine. This chatbot is exceptional because it's built on intelligence of AI models such as GPT-4o, Gemini, Grok, Deepseek, Claude and Qwen. Ensuring a deeper understanding of your needs and queries.

Interacting with Genie, an AI chatbot, is both enjoyable and practical. You can throw any question at it, seek advice, organize your schedule, or indulge in a casual conversation. What makes it stand out is the multiple AI models' (built on GPT-4o, Gemini, Grok, Deepseek, Claude and Qwen) advanced AI capabilities, making it not just smart, but incredibly intuitive. Whether you're tech-savvy or just a regular smartphone user, you'll find Genie's interface user-friendly and easy to navigate.

This AI chatbot, built on GPT-4o technology, is like a personal assistant that's available round the clock. You can rely on Genie for quick answers, helpful suggestions, or even as a learning companion. The integration of GPT-4o's AI technology means that Genie is constantly learning and evolving, making each chat experience better than the last.

Genie understands context and nuance better than most chatbots. Whether you're planning a trip, needing recipe ideas, or just feeling chatty, Genie is equipped to handle a wide range of topics with ease. It's not just a chatbot; it's a smart AI companion designed to enhance your daily life, making every interaction with your smartphone more meaningful and productive.

Do not enter personal information. May generate offensive or dangerous content. Genie is not liable for content generated.

Privacy: https://appnation.co/privacy
Terms: https://appnation.co/terms

app.summary: AI Chat with GPT-4o, Gemini, Grok, Deepseek, Qwen, Claude & AI Image Generator

reviews.text: I'm unable to convert images directly. However, I can suggest some ways you can achieve a Studio Ghibli art style for your image. 1. **Use Digital Art Software:** Programs like Adobe Photoshop or Procreate allow you to manipulate images and apply painting techniques reminiscent of Studio Ghibli's aesthetic. 2. **Study Ghibli Styles:** Look at characters and landscapes from Studio Ghibli films. Notice their vibrant colors, soft lines, and whimsical features, and try to replicate that style in

I currently don't have the capability to convert images or create visual artwork. However, I can suggest some tips to achieve a Studio Ghibli-inspired style in your artwork: 1. **Color Palette**: Use soft, earthy colors along with vibrant tones. Ghibli art often features lush greens, warm pastels, and rich skies. 2. **Character Design**: Create characters with exaggerated features, such as large eyes and whimsical expressions. Incorporate elements of nature in their design to mirror the studi

Great app, but would have rated higher if there wasn't a permanent paywall begging for an approximate 70$ subscription before every single question the user asks. I was definitely planning to upgrade at some point but it's really obnoxious to be in the user's face about it constantly. Plus it has almost accidentally charged me several times. Would have more faith in this company if this was fixed.

I've experimented with chat GPT in my browser before and it's pretty astonishing. To give an idea of what it can do, this AI can actually write knitting patterns. The more complex ones can have some minor errors (such as yarn yardage) but pointing out its mistakes seems to fairly reliably yield the correct results. As for this app, I like it a lot so far. If I come to find that I have a real need for it on a regular basis, I'd say it might be worth it to pay for the full version.

Greed made this app worse. I paid for the annual subscription in 2023, and then it changed to monthly before my year was up. I canceled because of the short notice of me paying monthly and disregarding my annual subscription. After that, more options I liked and was willing to pay for later started to disappear. Now, the responses are repeating, which made no sense. Genie started out as a really good app and a great annual subscription. Now, it is slow, expensive, and glitches.
reviews.replyText: We're sorry to hear about your experience, April JJ. We strive to provide the best service possible and value your feedback. Please reach out to our customer service team so we can address your concerns and improve your experience.

reviews.text: It is amazing. No kidding. But if your answer is more than 3 paragraphs, the AI will just stop mid sentence. Really frustrating. I wish it would complete it's thought before reaching the limit, or, better yet, have no limit. Then you could actually have it write stories and enjoy them. But the limit and each question being a new conversation are the only negative aspects of this app.

It's very good, just the fact that i have to tap the texting bar multiple times in order to actually type, and maybe it would be a bit better if everytime someone refreshed a message, they wouldn't lose any wishes. Besides that i rate it 4 stars because it's pretty good. (I forgot to say, you just have a main problem with the texting bar, you just have a small bit of bugs to fix!)

This Ai chat is perfect for roleplaying needs. The ability to follow along with you as you type is astounding, and honestly impressive. Even besides that, all side features like photo analysis and simple chats are just cool features. It's so good, in fact, that there really is only one issue I can name: The lack of a PFP system. It would be nice to be able to personalize that, and perhaps even the Genie AI's icon, but mostly just the main one.

Very impressive app. Enjoy it immensely. The gpt3 technology it's certainly a breakthrough. However, there are subtle issues with this app. When asked the current time for my locale it is inaccurate and it will indicate that it's 25 p.m. Also, when I try to program it to remember my name and the name I have given to the AI... it doesn't remember. Other than that, the app is fantastic. I recommend it highly over comparable gpt-3 AI assistant apps.

I enjoyed using this app so much that I purchased a year's membership. Unfortunately, the moment I made this purchase, I had nothing but trouble, like being double charged for a yearly and a weekly subscription and, most notably, no longer having access to the "pro gpt-4" model instead of the standard 3.5 model. I hope this is a glitch and not a scam, but just in case, buyer beware!

app.AIReview:
GPT Chatbot AI - Genie Review

Overview

GPT Chatbot AI - Genie presents itself as a comprehensive AI assistant, leveraging multiple large language models (LLMs) – GPT-4o, Gemini, Grok, Deepseek, Claude, and Qwen – within a single mobile application. With over 7 million installs and a robust 4.45 rating, the app’s popularity suggests it's tapping into a significant demand for accessible AI assistance. The free price point further contributes to its wide adoption, making it an attractive option for users curious about exploring different LLMs without upfront investment. The core proposition is ambitious: offering a unified interface to interact with diverse AI models, potentially streamlining tasks and providing varied perspectives in one place. However, the execution of this ambitious concept is what ultimately determines Genie’s long-term success.

Key Features

Genie’s feature set is undeniably broad, reflecting its multi-model architecture. The key features include:

  • Multi-Model Chat: Users can seamlessly switch between interacting with GPT-4o, Gemini, Grok, Deepseek, Claude, and Qwen. This allows for comparing responses from different models to the same prompt – a critical feature for understanding model strengths and weaknesses.
  • AI Image Generator: Integrated directly into the chat interface, users can generate images based on text prompts using the power of the underlying AI models. This expands functionality beyond pure text-based conversation.
  • Contextual Conversation Management: The app claims to maintain context across multiple turns within a single chat session, allowing for more natural and detailed conversations than traditional chatbot implementations. (This is a common feature across many LLM apps but critical for effectiveness.)
  • Customizable Prompt Templates: Users can save frequently used prompts as templates for quicker access during their interactions.
  • Multi-Language Support: The app supports multiple languages, broadening its accessibility to a global audience.
  • Offline Access (Limited): While full offline functionality isn’t available, Genie offers limited offline access to previously accessed conversation history – potentially useful for accessing information without an internet connection.

Strengths

Genie's greatest strength lies in its experimental approach. The ability to instantly compare responses from such a diverse range of high-performing LLMs is genuinely valuable. Users can quickly discern how different models handle specific tasks, revealing nuances in their capabilities and limitations. The inclusion of the AI image generator adds significant versatility, transforming the app from simply a text chatbot into a creative tool. The large install base (7+ million) demonstrates considerable user traction, suggesting that the underlying technology is resonating with a broad audience. Furthermore, the free price point dramatically lowers the barrier to entry, allowing anyone to experiment with cutting-edge AI without financial commitment. The app's design appears relatively clean and intuitive for navigating between models and initiating conversations.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Genie exhibits several areas needing refinement. The biggest challenge is user onboarding. With so many models available, new users will likely feel overwhelmed by the sheer number of options. A more guided tutorial or simpler initial setup process would significantly improve the user experience. Response Consistency: Across different models, response quality and style can vary substantially. While comparison is a strength, the lack of consistent formatting and tone across models creates a disjointed experience. Standardizing output formats and offering some level of model-specific styling controls could address this. Context Management: Although the app claims contextual awareness, it frequently struggles to retain context over longer conversations, particularly when switching between models. This is a common challenge with LLMs but requires more robust implementation in Genie. Finally, the app’s reliance on potentially significant computational resources may lead to occasional performance issues or slow response times, especially during peak usage periods.

User Experience

The user interface (UI) of Genie is functional rather than particularly polished. The layout prioritizes model selection and chat input, but lacks visual enhancements that could improve engagement. Navigation between models feels somewhat clunky, requiring multiple taps to switch. The AI image generator integration, while innovative, could be more seamlessly integrated within the main chat flow. The UI doesn't effectively convey the different capabilities of each underlying LLM - a small informational blurb beside each model would greatly benefit user understanding. While generally responsive, occasional lag is present when generating images or processing complex prompts.

Value for Money

As a free app, Genie offers exceptional value for money. The ability to access and experiment with multiple leading-edge LLMs without any cost is a significant advantage. Users can explore the strengths and weaknesses of different models – GPT-4o, Gemini, Grok, Deepseek, Claude, and Qwen – to determine which best suits their needs. The included image generation functionality adds considerable value, effectively doubling the app's utility. While premium features or subscriptions could be introduced in the future, the current free offering provides a compelling entry point into the world of advanced AI chatbots.

Conclusion

GPT Chatbot AI - Genie represents an ambitious attempt to consolidate access to multiple powerful LLMs within a single mobile application. Its strengths – particularly its diverse model selection and free price – are undeniable, contributing to its high user rating. However, challenges remain concerning onboarding complexity, response consistency, context management, and occasional performance issues. Genie has the potential to become an indispensable tool for AI enthusiasts and professionals seeking to explore the capabilities of different LLMs. With continued development focused on refining the user experience, improving model integration, and optimizing performance, Genie could solidify its position as a leading AI assistant app. It’s a worthwhile download for anyone interested in experimenting with cutting-edge AI technology – just be prepared for some initial friction while navigating its diverse features.
